column4: hi.. I have this line written in crontab : * * * * * sh /home/au/cron/iesss.sh but the script actually doesn't starty any time?! any clue?
that means run every second of every min of every hour of every etc...
well it will run all the time - do u really want that?
actually I wanted that to run every 3 minutes but after I got to know it doesn't run I changed it to better control if it already runs
use */3 and is the sh <filename> all on one line?
what is the script? pastebin it if u can
it works ok if I run it normally
are you using your crontab or roots?
do what ikonia said and make it executable and dont use sh
then dont use sh in front of it
should it be running in your home dir?
yes, it should be running in my home dir. my username is au
